name: My Block Puzzle
description:
Welcome to My Block Puzzle - a classy block game that will bring even more fun to you !

My Block is a simple, yet extremely addictive game that is suitable for all ages. We have two game modes for players to choose from - first one is the regular level mode to play and another one is a challenge mode.

Feature of My Block:
Simple rules and easy control
Multiple props available for you to play more effectively,
Many different levels (including various sets of difficulty),
Smooth and delicate animation,
More Woodblock modes to choose,
Beginners’ guide so that all the ages could enjoy playing.

How to play My Block:
Drag the blocks into the grid,
Try to fit them all in one row or column,
Since placed, those blocks cannot be moved again,
If there is no space to put the block at, then the game is over.


FREE DOWNLOAD NOW !
We are working on improving the game, so if you have any question, let us know your thought and tips via blockpuzzle.help@boooea.com

Let’s enjoy this classic block puzzle game !
